timeline.author: arminru

timeline.bodyText: why 8? I think it would be useful to have a benchmark with a number of threads that's unlikely to match a multiple of the number of cores. 5 or 10 would be other nice numbers to try.
timeline.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Let me think about this, and will do the change in a different PR.
replies.author: bogdandrutu
